channel.title: FAQ on Linux
channel.description: Recent content in FAQ on Linux

item.description: 修改主机名 临时修改 # 当前主机名 $ hostname # 临时修改 $ hostname kail.pc CentOS 永久修改 # 1. 新增或修改 HOSTNAME $ vim /etc/sysconfig/network HOSTNAME=kail.pc # 2. hosts 映射 $ vim /etc/hosts 127.0.0.1 kail.pc Ubuntu 永久修改 $ vim /etc/hostname kail.pc # 重启后查看 $ reboot

查看系统版本 CentOS $ cat /etc/centos-release CentOS release 6.7 (Final) Ubuntu $ cat /etc/lsb-release DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu DISTRIB_RELEASE=20.04 DISTRIB_CODENAME=focal DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS" Common $ cat /proc/version Linux version 2.6.32-431.29.2.el6.x86_64 (root@xxx) (gcc version 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-11) (GCC) ) #1 SMP Wed Sep 16 11:10:09 CST 2015 # 内核版本 $ uname -r 2.6.32-431.29.2.el6.x86_64 # 架构 $ uname -i x86_64 $ uname -a Linux localhost 2.6.32-431.29.2.el6.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Sep 16 11:10:09 CST 2015 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
